column5: Ya mike that's what it looks like at my lake !!!! Still pretty much frozen over !!!! But yes I will have my boat ready snow or rain it's the same ritual every year !!!!!! Tight-lines
that could be bass opener at this rate. Sheesh, it was snowing here a little while ago
After today's speckled trout, 5kms bush walk/skunk...i'm MORE than ready for softwater opener!!!!!
my boat doesn't arrive till June so definitely not ready i
Can't wait to catch some crappies...
